content: Armor can be upgraded, with Silk once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ginseng_Cape.md', within the main section titled 'Ginseng Cape'.
The content is as follows:
Armor can be upgraded, with Silk once you reach Chen Loong and open the Zodiac Realm in The New West in Chapter 3.
